title: [CLIENT] [MAC] DJ Sona, no music button in scoreboard.
body:
Hi, 

Since release of DJ Sona i cannot find music button next to her avatar in scoreboard. When i'm playing her, music is working just fine but when someone else is playing her i hear just music from the game. 

1. Start your officjal League of Legends Mac OS client.
2. Create a custom game with your friend and make him pick {{champion:37}}  with a DJ skin.
3. Press tab at the beginning of the game and try to find the damn button.
4. Cry because RIOT forgot about Mac users.

100% reproduction.

replies.body:
Hey LEAVEmyMOMalone! 

The button isn't located on the scoreboard itself, but to the far left of the screen when you're holding tab. Check out [this post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/0AQTKJI1-how-to-opting-in-to-dj-sonas-music) on opting in. It explains where the button is a bit more clearly.

If you're still having issues, please feel free to reach out!
The button doesn't appear on the scoreboard. It appears by the champion portraits with the green ult indicators on the left of the UI.
